verses.roman:
svarūpa-gosāñi tabe madhura kariyā
gīta-govindera pada gāya prabhure śunāñā

synonyms: svarūpa-gosāñi—Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosvāmī; tabe—thereafter; madhura kariyā—very sweetly; gīta-govindera—of the book Gīta-govinda; pada—one verse; gāya—sings; prabhure—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; śunāñā—making to hear.
translation: Thus for the pleasure of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosvāmī began very sweetly singing the following verse from Gīta-govinda.
